channel.title: Admins on Nollmann Lab website
channel.description: Recent content in Admins on Nollmann Lab website

item.title: INSERM Calendar
item.description: Calendars Go to the site : //webmail.inserm.fr/cal/index.html#?refresh=1568626616955 On the calendar, select the desired time slot and click on edit details: At the top right, indicate the name of the room and then give a title to the reservation (Group meeting for example). In the top right corner, remember to indicate the room’s reference so that the reservation appears in the room’s calendar: Enter “res-318@” or the name of the room to find it:
